thread.section_title: Saatva Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatva Mattress | saatvamattress.com
thread.title: Mariana Delgado
thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by Mariana Delgado

author: Mariana Delgado
title: Mariana Delgado
text: My granddaughter gifted me my 11.5" Luxury Firm mattress.. and boy do I LOVE it. As I lay on my Luxury Firm it cradles every inch of my body, at this age its provided me with the perfect amount of support that my back needs. The delivery experience was professional and set up my mattress in my desired bed room. THANK YOU Saatva with providing me the mattress that I've been looking for my whole life.
